articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Rotten Chains is one of the best gears you can find in Jujutsu Infinite, and it can drastically improve your character once equipped.


There are different gears you can equip, and some of them are pretty ordinary. Rotten Chains, on the other hand, is a Special Grade gear, and it is immensely powerful. Unlike most resources, you can't trade for it or open chests to find it. Instead, you'll have to put in the hard yards in order to secure the gear inside Jujutsu Infinite.


How to obtain Rotten Chains in Jujutsu Infinite


There are two ways to obtain Rotten Chains inside the game. You can obtain it by defeating the Finger Bearer Boss in a raid or craft it directly with the correct resources. After completing the Finger Bearer Boss raid, there's a chance for Rotten Chains to drop as the mai…
articles.title: How to get Rotten Chains in Jujutsu Infinite

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Gilded Apple is one of the few items in Jujutsu Infinite that needs to be found if you're desperate to complete a certain quest.


Completing quests in Jujutsu Infinite is pretty important if you want to improve your in-game progression consistently. Some of them often reward you with valuable resources that can be extremely useful on your journey. Unlike typical resources, the Gilded Apple can't be found in chests or traded in the Curse Market.


Let's take a look at how you can obtain this item.


How to find the Gilded Apple in Jujutsu Infinite


To begin the process, you'll need to activate the Gilded Apple quest from the NPC in the Numa Temple area. This location can be found to the southeast of Shijo Town, where everyone begins their journey. The NPC can be found near the mission…
articles.title: How to get Gilded Apple in Jujutsu Infinite

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
If you’re someone who likes retro gaming with original hardware while still getting the best image quality, then the RetroTink 4K is currently the absolute best way to go. However, it is expensive, so if you’re not willing to pay for such an enthusiast device, then a cheaper version is on its way.


Before you get too excited, it’s still an expensive proposition. The RetroTink-4K CE (cheaper edition?) will still run you $475 USD. That’s quite a bit cheaper than the $750 for the RetroTink-4K Pro, but it’s still quite expensive. Considering you can get a Nintendo Switch for cheaper, you can see how this is an enthusiast-only device.


To back up for a sec, the RetroTink-4K is a type of hardware that upscales the video output of older devices. Your TV technically already does that, but for an…
articles.title: There’s a cheaper Retrotink-4K upscaler incoming if you’re not made of money

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Robert Pires Winter Wildcards Icon SBC is now live in EA FC 25, and you can complete the challenge to earn a special Icon item for your Ultimate Team squad.


To play with the Pires card, you'll have to complete all the tasks of the challenge. Let's take a look at the easiest way to complete the latest Icon SBC, and if you should spend your resources trying to get it done. 


EA FC 25 Robert Pires Winter Wildcards Icon SBC tasks


The Robert Pires Winter Wildcards Icon SBC has six tasks, and here are the conditions.


Task 1 - Born Legend



Min. 11 Players: Rare


Player quality: Min. Bronze



Task 2 - Rising Star



Min. 11 Players: Rare


Player quality: Min. Silver



Task 3 - On a Loan



Min. Team Rating: 81



Task 4 - Les Bleus



Min. 1 Players from: France


Min. Team Rating…
articles.title: EA FC 25 Robert Pires Winter Wildcards Icon SBC solutions

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
2024 is at an end, and with the world slowly starting to welcome 2025, the Heavensturn event is back in Final Fantasy XIV, celebrating eastern culture and the year of the snake. Here’s how to get all of the Heavensturn 2025 rewards. 


The events during Heavensturn events are never particularly challenging, but those during the 2025 event are easier than they’ve been in recent years. Getting your hands on the Great White Tsuchinoko minion is remarkably easy, as long as you have some knowledge of eastern culture and customs, as well as some understanding of in-game lore. 


How to get the Great White Tsuchinoko minion in FFXIV


Screenshot by Destructoid


To begin the Heavensturn 2025 event quest, head to Limsa Lominsa and make your way to the Aftcastle. When you get there, seek out the He…
articles.title: How to get the Great White Tsuchinoko minion in Final Fantasy XIV (Heavensturn 2025 event guide)

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
It’s always the same at this time of year, the ball is prepped and ready to drop in Times Square, families are getting ready to gather together, and a whole new year full of fresh possibilities is almost upon us. New Year’s resolutions are being made around the world, and one is more common than any other. 


After the holiday season, filled with excuses to gorge and reasons to skip exercising, it’s fair to say that everyone feels a little down about their eating and fitness routines to an extent. The new year offers a chance to set an achievable goal, and if you’re anything like it, it usually has something to do with becoming more physically active. 


It’s an achievable goal, but there are issues when it comes to implementing new fitness regimes into day-to-day life. Many of us work at …
articles.title: 10 best games that can actually help you succeed in those new year fitness resolutions

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Dragon Tokens have confused many Blox Fruits players since they randomly got added to the account of certain players, but it has their use inside the game.


Incidentally, the mysterious item wasn't available in the account of every player. Instead, it got added to the accounts of those who have been Blox Fruits for some time now and had downloaded Update 24 before the developers pulled back. As I said, this item has certain uses inside the game, so let's understand how it works.


How to get Dragon Tokens in Blox Fruits


Update 24 introduced several new things to Blox Fruits, which included an updated version of the Dragon Fruit. Unfortunately, the update was pulled back by the developers, and players who had the Dragon Fruit lost access to it. To compensate the players, they were handed something called a Dragon Token.


Again, this token is of two types. Players having a non-permanent or physical version of the Dragon Fruit were provided with a regular Dragon Token. Those who had a permanent Dragon Fruit were provided with a Permanent Dragon Token.


Incidentally, the price of Dragon Fruit has been raised from 4,000 Robux to 5,000 following the implementation of Update 24.




How to use Dragon Tokens in Blox Fruits


The use of a Dragon Token mostly depends on the type you have. If you have a permanent Dragon Token, you can use it to obtain a permanent East or West Dragon Fruit. The version will be completely randomized, but it's a great return since you're getting an upgraded version of the Dragon Fruit.


If you received a non-permanent Dragon Token, you can use it to get a non-permanent East or West Dragon Fruit. Again, the final item you get will be completely randomized. If you end up getting a duplicate Dragon Fruit in your inventory, it will be automatically changed to a Mythical Fruit.

The post How do Dragon Tokens work in Blox Fruits appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How do Dragon Tokens work in Blox Fruits

articles.author: Franklin Bellone Borges
articles.description:
Marvel Rivals allows players to equip their favorite heroes (and villains) with a good amount of unlockable costumes, going from comic-exclusive looks to a wide array of MCU-inspired skins. But given the large history behind each member of the game's cast, there are many more we would love to see. Here are 10 alternative skins we would love to see arrive in Marvel Rivals.


Black Suit (Spider-Man)


Image via Marvel Comics.


Although the character might be a hit gameplay-wise, Spidey's Marvel Rivals default and alternative in-game suits are seen by many as a miss, with his PlayStation-exclusive Scarlet Spider being a saving grace. Well, that's where the classic Black Suit comes in, as the simplistic look is both a fan favorite and one hell of a fit, so much so that Peter continued to wear…
articles.title: 10 skins we would love to see in Marvel Rivals

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
It's time to celebrate the end of 2024 and the start of a new year with a beautiful outfit in Dress to Impress. The Sparkling Resolution outfit features a dress, necklace, and sleeves but is only available until January 2, 2025.


How to get the Sparkling Resolution outfit in Dress to Impress


The Sparkling Resolution outfit is a limited-time set available in the Dress to Impress clothing shop for $6,000 in-game cash or the equivalent of 1,500 Robux. You can buy the set's individual pieces or all three items at once starting from December 30 until the event's end date, January 2, 2025.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You can view the Sparkling Resolution outfit by selecting the shoe and lipstick button on the left side of your screen and navigating to the dress button.


You have the option to buy each of the three items separately or all at once if you have enough cash. Below is the cost of every Sparkling Resolution piece:



Sparkling Dress: $4,500


Sparkling Sleeve: $1,000


Sparkling Necklace: $500



Purchasing all three pieces costs $6,000 in-game money, making it not only possible to acquire without spending real money but making it cheaper than sets like Myra the Magical Girl. However, it's only available until January 2, giving you just a few days to get your hands on this exclusive outfit. 


It doesn't come with a hairstyle or makeup, though, so you may have to use a few Dress to Impress codes to complete the set.


Like other outfits in Dress to Impress, you can customize the Sparkling Resolution set to match your current theme. Depending on the theme, you may have to change it to other common colors like white, black, red, or a mix of several hues. Similarly, if you're not a fan of purple and want to try something new, you can experiment with various patterns and see what sticks.

The post How to unlock the New Years outfit in Dress to Impress appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to unlock the New Years outfit in Dress to Impress

If you're trying to get valuable items in Jujutsu Infinite, acquiring Jade Lotus will be vital, as it helps you by taking away your reliance on luck.


In Jujutsu Infinite, chests help you get plenty of resources that are required to unlock power-ups like Domain Expansion and Innate Techniques. Some of these resources, like Maximum Scrolls, are rare items, and their spawn rates are extremely low. Naturally, you would want to use consumables to improve your luck, and a Jade Lotus is perhaps your best friend in this matter.


Best ways to farm Jade Lotus in Jujutsu Infinite


Jade Lotus isn't your normal resource, and its true benefits are during chest openings. When you open any chest in Jujutsu Infinite, the rewards will have different rarities. It begins from Common and then goes up, and …

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
It is the Support Gem that makes the Skill in Path of Exile 2, and there is quite a huge variety to choose from. The sheer volume available may be intimidating (and for good reason), but there are some Support Gems that you should absolutely not ignore.


Strongest Support Gems in Path of Exile 2


Support Gems are the backbone of your Skills, and the best ones can turn a good build into an amazing one. Here are the most potent; the ones that ultimately define or unleash a Skill's potential.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Controlled Destruction


With Controlled Destruction equipped on any Spell, it gains 30% increased damage at the cost of causing it to be unable to hit critically. If you're building raw damage, this Support Gem is one of the most powerful thanks to its multiplicative natu…

When Grinding Gear Games dropped the announcement for Path of Exile 2 (PoE2), it wasn’t just about continuing the series. It was about shaking things up in a big way, making changes that fundamentally alter the way players would engage with the sequel to one of gaming's most impactful ARPGs.


One of the biggest, most defining changes? The approach toward difficulty. From the slower, Souls-like campaign to the highly punishing Endgame, this topic is a firey one for the community. So, let’s talk about it: is the difficulty a bit too much, or is it exactly what the franchise needed to evolve?


Path of Exile 2 - Prepare to Die Edition


Screenshot by Destructoid


If you’ve played the campaign in PoE2, you’ve probably noticed it’s got some serious Souls-like vibes. It’s slower, more delibera…

articles.author: Sorrel Kerr-Jung
articles.description:
If you were to ask any fan of rhythm games what their favorite titles are, odds are that their first choices will likely be a selection of games that are now relegated to consoles past, lost to ever-progressing technology. It’s easy to believe that the genre itself is lost to history, but that’s not necessarily the case. 


Yes, games like Dance Dance Revolution, Rock Band, and Guitar Hero are undoubtedly reserved for those old-school gamers who still have their old consoles, or visit Dave & Busters on a regular basis. However, that doesn’t mean that newer rhythm games don’t exist for current-generation Console or PC players, you just have to look a little harder to find them. 


And they’re worth playing for more reasons than simply passing the time, as well. Did you know that playing rhy…

articles.description:
Tilt your head to the sky, all you true believers out there: Marvel Studios rang in the new year with the first trailer for Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, a new animated series set to put a new spin on Peter Parker's rise to heroism. 


Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man has already crossed many boxes off the standard "Spider-Man origin story" checklist: a do-it-yourself superhero suit, high school drama, and a variation of Spidey's age-old mantra about power and responsibility. However, the series' teaser made it clear as day that this retelling of the Wall Crawler's early days is taking big swings and changing some things around.


Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man shows off Spidey's new friends, enemies, and paint job




Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man's teaser fol…

Some of the best swords in gaming are particularly iconic, such as the Keyblade and the Master Sword from The Legend of Zelda. They help give us a power fantasy in video games as they strengthen our heroes and strike fear into our foes. 


So here are the ten most iconic swords in gaming—and naturally—this is my humble opinion. Let's go.


10. The Crucible (Doom Eternal)


Screenshot via Bethesda Softworks' YouTube channel


The Crucible from Doom Eternal is the epitome of badass. This huge red sword with the flared blade tip is one of the main marketing images shown within the trailer of the game, as seen above, ramping up excitement for the 2020 sequel. It lets you slice and dice demons with its sheer power. It's filled with demon energy and has some epic text on the blade that makes the…

Trading is one of the best ways to enhance your in-game development in Jujutsu Infinite, and it's immensely beneficial as you approach the endgame content.

articles.description:
Dress to Impress' Myra the Magical Girl outfit is back for good. While it was previously available for a limited time and famously known as the Madoka set, it's since been rereleased and reworked to look more detailed and elegant in its design.


How to find the Myra the Magical Girl outfit in Dress to Impress


The Myra the Magical Girl outfit is available in the Dress to Impress shop for $12,800 in-game cash or the equivalent of 3,350 Robux. You can find this shop by selecting the shoe and lipstick button on the left side of your screen. From here, you'll spot Robux items, limited-time sets, and the Myra the Magical Girl outfit under the dress button on the shop screen.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You can buy each piece of the Magical Girl outfit separately, allowing you to slowly obta…

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Fortnite's Wintervestigation quest series is finally wrapping up, with Noir telling you about one last case leading you to confront Sgt. Winter himself. Before meeting Sgt. Winter, you'll need to search for some secret files that are part of his Naughty or Nice list.


Sgt. Winter Naughty or Nice list secret file location in Fortnite


You can find the secret files for Sgt. Winter's Naughty or Nice list in a tunnel along Foxy Floodgate's massive dam. As you reach this landmark, head up the zipline that connects the bottom of the dam to the road and stop around halfway. You'll spot several openings to the tunnel, with one entrance having a gingerbread cookie in front of it. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


Once you arrive at this spot, use your pickaxe to break open the tunnel before entering. You'll spot three exclamation mark icons on top of various filing cabinets, one of which has Sgt. Winter's Naughty or Nice list.


There's a chance you'll run into the same bug I did where the filing cabinets appear invisible. Don't worry if this happens, as you can still interact with them as long as you hover over their general location.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You'll also need to watch out for other players as you visit Foxy Floodgate, climb the dam, and examine the secret files. Make sure to have a weapon on hand in case someone arrives before or after you so you can swiftly eliminate them and move on with your quest.


Once you interact with the filing cabinets and the Naughty or Nice list, you'll be ready to confront Sgt. Winter once and for all. You'll spot him just south of Foxy Floodgate at an unnamed location, giving you a bit of a trek before completing this final Wintervestigation quest. Like before, other players can attack you anytime, so watch your surroundings as you travel to these spots.

The post How to find Sgt Winter’s Secret Files in Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to find Sgt Winter’s Secret Files in Fortnite

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
After much confusion over the last few days, there's finally some clarity over Frost Petals in Jujutsu Infinite. This peculiar resource has been present inside the game since its launch, but there was no way to obtain it, getting players stuck in a particular quest, but that is no longer the case.


Here is how you can get Frost Petals in Jujutsu Infinite, and what's the best way to use it.


Best Frost Petals location in Jujutsu Infinite


For most resources in Jujutsu Infinite, opening chests is the best way forward. That's not the case for Frost Petals, which spawns all over Yuki Fortress. While the spawn spots aren't restricted to one single location, they can be generally found behind the fort.


Move towards the edge of the map in this region, and you'll find plenty of Frost Petals. The middle of the map also has these flowers spawning on the ground. Once picked, the flower will take 10 minutes to respawn on your server. If you're willing to be patient and dedicate an hour or so, you can pick plenty of Frost Petals.


Incidentally, this is the only plant that spawns in the Yuki Fortress area. Other plants like Cursebloom and Spring Puffs can't be found here. Frost Petals also seem exclusive to the Yuki Fortress area, and you'll have to level up decently to access this location.




How to use Frost Petals in Jujutsu Infinite


Frost Petals work differently from other resources like Maximum Scrolls or Purified Curse Hands. You can use five of them to complete daily quests in the Yuki Fortress Area.  If you're a beginner, your first priority is leveling up to Level 300 or higher. Doing so will allow you access to this area and help you to enhance your character further. Check out our farming guide to get all the resources efficiently.

The post How to get Frost Petals in Jujutsu Infinite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Frost Petals in Jujutsu Infinite

The Mines in Stardew Valley are filled with weird and wonderful monsters to defeat, each with its own resource drops and method of killing. While most are easy, some may prove problematic, including the Lava Crab. 


The Lava Crab is an enemy deep inside the Mines in Stardew Valley. At first glance, you might not even realize that it is hostile, as it looks suspiciously like a rock. These are very small differences between the appearance of a rock and that of a Lava Crab, such as a smoother highlight, but those differences are hard to spot if you’re speedrunning through the floors. 


Whether you’re hunting for Lava Crabs to get their worthwhile drops or trying to complete the Monster Eradication Goal at the Adventurer’s Guild (which requires you to kill 60 Rock Crabs of any type), here’s …
articles.title: How to find and kill Lava Crabs in Stardew Valley

articles.description:
Square Enix announced its new strategy to release more multiplatform games a few months after Final Fantasy VII Rebirth came out exclusively on PlayStation 5. Because of this dichotomy, many wondered if the company suddenly changed opinions because that game sold poorly.


Yoshinori Kitase is an important figure at Square Enix and the producer of Final Fantasy VII Rebirth. He recently talked with IGN Brazil and addressed this exact issue, explaining that Rebirth was among the three titles that received the award for Best-Selling Game during Sony's PlayStation Partners Awards in Japan back in October. "I think being recognized in this aspect gives me the certainty that we have reached a certain level," said Kitase.


Screenshot via FINAL FANTASY/YouTube


While Square Enix hasn't revealed t…
articles.title: Despite strong sales, Part 3 of the Final Fantasy VII Remake won’t be console-exclusive, says the game’s producer

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Limit Break is a powerful form of enhancement that will be extremely useful in Anime Adventures if you want to boost your characters.


There are several ways to power up your characters in the game. Doing so is extremely fruitful, as the first part of the relaunch might feel boring for many. Thanks to the enhancements, you can power up your characters faster. Here's how limit breaking works in the relaunched version of Anime Adventures.


Limit breaking in Anime Adventures, explained


To Limit Break, you'll need to have 12 Mythic or higher units and also get a Divine Wish. Getting characters isn't a big challenge, and you can do it using different methods. The trickier task is to get the Divine Wish, which is mandatory to enhance your characters.


Complete the following steps once you have a Divine Wish:



Go to the Evolve area.


Talk with the Limit Break NPC.


Select the unit you want to Limit Break using the Pick Unit option.


Click on the icon on the right and decide which units you'll sacrifice.


Complete the process by selecting 12 Mythic units and one Divine Wish.


Click Limit Break to upgrade the character of your choice. The characters you sacrificed won't return.



Image by Destructoid


Best ways to farm Divine Wish in Anime Adventures


The best way to get Divine Wish in Anime Adventures is by paying attention to the daily challenge. You will be guaranteed one wish daily if you complete the daily challenge. Also, be on the lookout for limited-time events. Some of these events will drop Divine Wish among the rewards.


Once you Limit Break a unit, all characters on your board will get a 5% permanent damage boost. Once you've collected enough characters, make sure to Limit Break your best units to increase your team's potential.

The post How to Limit Break in Anime Adventures appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to Limit Break in Anime Adventures

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Winter Wildcards Draft objective is now live in EA FC 25, and you can play Online and Offline Drafts to earn plenty of useful rewards.


 This is the first time EA Sports has released a Draft-related objective in this year's Ultimate Team. There are plenty of ways to earn a Draft token to enter it, and let's look at all the rewards waiting for you after completing the objective set. 


EA FC 25 Winter Wildcards Draft objective guide


The Winter Wildcards Draft objective has seven different tasks. Some can only be completed in Online Draft, but in general, Offline Draft will be easier to play. 


Task
How to Complete
Rewards

Play 1 match in any Ultimate Team game mode.
Single Draft Token Pack

Completing the full set will also win you one 84+ x5 Rare Gold Players Pack. Overall, the rewards are pretty decent, and it's the perfect time to stack packs for the upcoming TOTY promo. Unless you're looking to complete the full set, you don't have to play in Online Draft. 


You'll be able to get a Draft Token daily by completing the SBC in exchange for 11 Rare Gold Players. If you win all four games in a single Draft, you can gain some really valuable packs, all of which are tradeable. Hence, make sure to complete the objective before it expires next week.

articles.description:
Fire up the sauna. My Summer Car, Amistech’s bizarre car-assembly ennui simulator, is finally ready to leave Early Access. It’s a little awkward right now, but it sounds like the switch will be flipped tomorrow.


Wow, can you believe it’s been eight-ish years since My Summer Car launched into the world via Early Access? I can’t. In fact, it feels like a bit longer than that for me, since I was eagerly anticipating it for quite a while before it finally reached my hands.


It reached a rather surprising level of popularity. It’s an extremely unconventional and unfriendly game. While its main focus is around putting together a junk heap of a car, you have basic needs like thirst, hunger, hygiene, and stress. Also, piss. Every so often, you have to relieve yourself, and it doesn’t matter muc…

Events in Infinity Nikki are ever-changing, so there’s always something new to do. The newest event is called “Into a Starry Night”, and you’ll need to complete some specific objectives to reap the event rewards.


To see everything that you need to do for this event, open up the event menu and navigate to the “Into a Starry Night” screen. articles.description:
EasyGameStation has announced via a Twitter post that an updated version of 2007’s roguelite item shop dungeon crawler game, Recettear is on its way. Recettear: An Item Shop’s Tale HD Edition will release sometime in 2025 on PC.


Don’t get your hopes up too far, however. This looks less like a remaster and more like a re-release. At least, if the screenshots attached to the tweet are any indication. I mean, truly, Recettear wasn’t technically HD when it was released. It ran at 1280x960 at most, so it wasn’t widescreen, and you’d typically keep it in a window. The screenshots are, at the very least, widescreen resolution. It’s hard to tell if they reach 1920x1080 resolution because the attached shots are formatted in the web-friendly 1200x675. I’m going to say it’s safe to assume the game …

All EA FC 25 TOTY promo dates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Anti-piracy coalition ACE wraps up a transformative and successful year. Despite major shifts in leadership, the MPA-backed coalition of media companies secured key victories, including the high-profile takedown of the Fmovies piracy network.  ACE also reported a number of other successes and has already set its sights on new 'pirate' targets for the coming year.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Wraps Up Transformative Year with a Fresh List of Pirate Site Targets

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Link-Busters is the unofficial DMCA takedown champion of 2024. The anti-piracy outfit works for many of the world's largest publishing companies and is currently flagging the majority of all 'pirate' URLs to Google search; more than two billion in total. Despite this stellar effort, book pirates are chalking up new records too. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: More Than Half of All Google Search Takedowns Now Come from Link-Busters

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
For the past several years, the recording industry has branded stream-ripping services the leading piracy threat. On the near horizon, the industry claims that the rise of generative AI presents a new and rapidly evolving challenge for the music ecosystem that threatens its long-term sustainability. According to global industry group IFPI, stream-ripping is likely fueling this secondary threat.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: IFPI: Stream-Ripping Fuels Generative AI From Which Existential Threats Emerge

articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Gladiator II' tops the chart, followed by 'The Order'. 'Venom: The Last Dance' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 12/30/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The final verdict in a Danish site blocking battle, involving LaLiga and Rojadirecta, confirms that live sports broadcasts are protected copyright works. This marks a significant victory for rightsholders, who believe that this landmark decision paves the way for increased blocking of pirate streaming services across Europe. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Danish Court Greenlights Copyright Protection for Live Sports in Landmark Blocking Case

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
According to a phrase popularized by Carl Sagan, extraordinary claims should be supported by extraordinary evidence. A new piracy scare story published on Sunday takes a different approach. The extraordinary claim is that fake IPTV portals run by law enforcement are entrapping "ordinary users" to obtain evidence of their crimes. Supported by exactly zero evidence, the report claims that hundreds of internet users have already been identified.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bogus Pirate IPTV Portals Run By Law Enforcement “Entrap Hundreds”

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
'House of the Dragon' is the most-pirated TV show released on torrent sites in 2024. The popular 'Game of Thrones' prequel replaces 'The Last of Us', which topped the chart last year. Amazon's 'The Boys' takes the second spot at a respectable distance, while Disney's Shōgun is the hottest newcomer.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Is The Most Pirated TV Show of 2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a landmark ruling, the Court of Milan has ordered Cloudflare to block pirate streaming services that offer Serie A football matches. The court found that Cloudflare's services are instrumental in facilitating access to live pirate streams, undermining Italy's 'Piracy Shield' legislation. The order, which applies in Italy, affects Cloudflare's CDN, DNS resolver, WARP and proxy services. It also includes a broad data disclosure section. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Must Block ‘Piracy Shield’ Domains and IP Addresses Across its Service

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Around 2016, sports streaming site Rojadirecta closed its doors to visitors from Spain after losing its legal battle with Mediapro. Despite the win, the broadcaster was disappointed that the court had found the company behind Rojadirecta liable, but not company owner Igor Seoane. After the Supreme Court held that Seoane could be held liable, last Friday a court confirmed total damages of $33 million, with Seoane and the company jointly liable for half of that amount.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Rojadirecta & Site Operator Hit With $33m Piracy Damages Judgment

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Once-thriving Usenet provider NSE was targeted by Dutch anti-piracy group BREIN many years ago. Under legal pressure, the provider felt forced to shut down its successful business. Though NSE ultimately triumphed in court, that victory came years later. NSE is now demanding millions of euros to compensate for the alleged damage to its business. BREIN, however, sees things differently. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Destroyed’ Usenet Provider Sues Anti-Piracy Group for Millions in Damages

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular shadow library LibGen continues to face trouble. In addition to ongoing technical problems, a U.S. lawsuit resulted in several domain suspensions and seizures in recent weeks. To top it off, the shadow library was just added to Germany's pirate site blocking list, making it harder to access the remaining domains.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Domain Seizures and German ISP Blockade Add to Libgen’s Troubles

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Sixteen well-known suppliers active in the UK pirate IPTV market have been selected by broadcaster Sky to star in a new phase of the company's ISP blocking program. A new order obtained at the High Court is technically an extension of an existing order won last year. However, with significant tweaks, upgrades and an extremely determined opponent, pirates may be about to face their toughest challenge yet.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sky’s Enhanced High Court Pirate IPTV Blocking Order Closes Loopholes

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The easiest way to hurt a pirate site, at least temporarily, is by taking away its domain name. Historically, domain name registries have been hesitant to take action but with the right approach, progress can be made. This week, anti-piracy group BREIN reported that following their complaints, the .nl and .eu registries took action against several 'pirate' domains. On closer inspection, it appears that copyright has little to do with it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EU and NL Domain Registries Take Down Piracy-Linked Domains

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Coordinated by Italy last month, a huge law enforcement operation reportedly 'dismantled' a pirate IPTV service with 22 million users. That's an extraordinary number and shows why countries like Italy have adopted mass site blocking measures. Logic suggests that the removal of such a huge player from the market might reduce the need for blocking measures, if only temporarily. The data shows that in the wake of the action, blocking demands significantly increased.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Dismantling a 22m User Pirate IPTV Service Led to Big Rise in ISP Blocking

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Two decades ago, the torrenting world lost a legend: Suprnova.org. This pioneering file-sharing site, once a hub for millions of users, was abruptly shut down on December 19th, 2004. Today, we revisit the Suprnova story and speak with the site's founder about its lasting impact and the YouTube empire he built in recent years.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Suprnova’s Founder Speaks: 20 Years, Many Lessons, and a YouTube Empire

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italians who simply view pirate IPTV via illicit subscriptions have been warned for months that their activities could be reported to the judicial authorities for potential prosecution. As part of an investigation into a pirate IPTV subscription seller, a total of 23 people have appeared in court in recent months for simply buying a pirate package. Judges in two separate proceedings have now acquitted all 23 after concluding that this type of piracy isn't actually a crime.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Judges Acquit a Total of 23 Pirate IPTV Subscribers: Personal Use is Not a Crime

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Federal Court of Canada has issued a new site blocking order requiring major ISPs to block access to Soap2Day domains. The order was issued in response to a lawsuit filed by Netflix, Bell, and several major Hollywood studios alleging copyright infringement.  The operators of the associated Soap2Day domains must pay millions of Canadian dollars in damages. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Netflix and Hollywood Obtain Canadian Site Blocking Order Against Pirate ‘Brand’ Soap2Day

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Suing people for consuming content illegally can be a risky endeavor for companies with brands to protect. Nevertheless, sports rightsholders now seem prepared to put brand integrity on the line in their fight against IPTV pirates. Spain's LaLiga is already mailing out 'fines', ostensibly to people who simply watched pirate streams. Predictably, there's more to it than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: LaLiga Isn’t ‘Fining’ IPTV Pirates For Viewing Streams, But For Providing Them

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
For over a decade, The Pirate Bay has been accepting Bitcoin donations. In dollar terms, this provided a relatively modest but consistent revenue stream. However, if the torrent site had held onto its early Bitcoin, it could have amassed a small fortune, worth $14 million today. The same applies to BitcoinTorrentz, which once charged today's equivalent of $8,000 per gigabyte transferred.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: The Pirate Bay’s Million-Dollar Bitcoin Donations: Hidden Goldmine or Spent Treasure?

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (criezy)

articles.description: Ho, ho, ho, Santa is in town. And he’s brought a gift with him. Here’s a shiny new package for you to unwrap, containing the first beta version of the upcoming OpenTTD 15 release. It comes faster, with road waypoints, fewer passwords, better scenario editor, and hopefully with a lot less bugs. To be a bit less vague, here are some of the highlights: Improved picker windows for stations/waypoints/objects/and more. Oh, and that does include road waypoints. Better perfomance in various places, including faster path signals that are now green by default. Password-less network authentication using keys. Several improvements for NewGRFs regarding cargo support. Better scenario editor with a town data importer and manual house placement. A large tree fully hung with ornamental bugfixes. Sadly though, not everbody was good this year. The old NPF pathfinder was finally retired, after YAPF being the superior default for many, many years now. There’s a lot of bugs left for you to find, though, guaranteed. Enjoy the beta, test all the things and report anything you find amiss, to make OpenTTD 15 the best OpenTTD 15 ever. Download Changelog Bug tracker
articles.title: OpenTTD 15.0-beta1

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Učebnicový příklad toho, jak někdo viděl fungující originál ("Sentimental", Španělsko 2020) a natočil jeho český "srandovnější" remake, aniž by chápal proč a jak ten originál fungoval. (Ilča 30 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: V dobrém i zlém - 20 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: "Bohužel" tento film není tak špatný, aby byl zábavný. Je to jen nuda, která není vůbec ničím zajímavá. Takhle nějak si představuji, že budou vypadat stoprocentně AI generované filmy. Nejzajímavější a nejzábavnější je malá role Russella Crowea.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Lovec Kraven [Kraven The Hunter] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Někdo napsal scénář s cool zápletkami a dialogy, někdo vymodeloval úžasná prostředí, někdo složil hudbu a nahrál dialogy skoro jako John Williams a Harrison Ford... To všechno funguje velmi dobře. Ale je to proloženo otravnou hrou, kde pořádně nefunguje boj, stealth ani puzzly, a jejíž interaktivita zdržuje od toho cool příběhu.
articles.title: Skororecenze: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Za pár dní má v našich kinech (a po celém světě) premiéru "remasterovaná verze" kultovní animované podívané Interstella 5555. A je důležité říct si něco o tom, o jakou podívanou vlastně jde a v čem přesně spočívá ten "remaster".
U zrodu tohoto počinu stálo elektronické hudební duo Daft Punk, které v roce 2001 vydalo své album "Discovery". K písničkám z alba vyšly animované videoklipy, které produkoval Leidži Macumoto, což byl kultovní japonský výtvarník (zemřel loni), který měl na svém kontě mnoho animovaných seriálů, především ze 70. - 80. let (nejslavnější z nich byl asi "Space Battleship Yamato"). Daft Punk ho oslovili proto, že na jeho seriálech vyrůstali, takže výsledné dílo, včetně "jednodušší" retro animace a naivní zápletky zcela záměrně připomíná staré japonské televizní počiny (n…
articles.title: Recenze: Daft Punk & Leiji Matsumoto's Interstella 5555 - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Pokud zbožňujete stejnojmenný divadelní muzikál, funguje tento film pravděpodobně velmi dobře. Pokud ho vůbec neznáte, budete ve výrazné nevýhodě, a to z vícero důvodů. Přestože mám muzikály rád, téměř vůbec se u mě nedostavil jakýkoliv pocit dojetí nebo jiná silná emoce a z písniček si téměř nic nepamatuji. Což je bizarní, protože zbožňuji písničky v "Princi egyptském", kterého napsal stejný autor pár let před "Čarodějkou". - Ilča 50 %
articles.title: Audio recenze: Čarodějka [Wicked - Part 1] - 70 %
